tool_description: Analyzes user behavior patterns, purchase history, and preferences to provide insights for personalized recommendations.
error_messages: Invalid analysis period: Period must be between 30 and 365 days.
Insufficient data: User does not have enough activity data for meaningful analysis.
User not found: The specified user_id does not exist in the system.
usage: Provide user_id to analyze their preferences. Optionally specify the analysis period in days to focus on recent behavior patterns.

preferred_categories.description: Array of user's preferred product categories ranked by interest

price_sensitivity.description: User's price sensitivity level (low, medium, high)

shopping_frequency.description: User's shopping frequency pattern (weekly, monthly, seasonal, irregular)

brand_preferences.description: Array of preferred brands based on purchase history
